      • setRestrictHdContentToWidevineL1

        public RendererConfig.Builder setRestrictHdContentToWidevineL1(boolean enable)
        Enables or disables a restriction to play 'protected HD content' ONLY on devices with Widevine security level 1 (L1). The restriction is enabled by default.
        Parameters:
        enable, - set false to disable restriction
